Package htw.vs1.filesystem.FileSystem.virtual

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    File
    A File represents a leaf in our filesystem.
    FileSystemInterface
    The FileSystemInterface declares the interface to work on our filesystem.
    Folder
    A Folder represents a node in our file system.
    FSObject
    A FSObject represents a object in our filesystem.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractFSObject
    Base class for all objects in our file system tree.
    FileSystem
    The FileSystem represents a file system on which you can perform actions like: print the current Working directory: FileSystem.printWorkingDirectory() change the working directory FileSystem.changeDirectory(String) list the content of the current folder FileSystem.listDirectoryContent() FileSystem.rename(String, String) / FileSystem.delete(String) Created by felix on 03.06.15.
    LocalFile
    A LocalFile represents a File in the local filesystem, which is a leaf in a LocalFolder.
    LocalFolder
    A LocalFolder represents a Folder of the local filesystem, which is a node of our filesystem.
    LocalFSObject
    Represents a object of our file system tree which is located on a *this* computer Created by Marc Otting on 10.06.2015.
    MountPointFolder
    The MountPointFolder contains all distributed sub filesystems which should be unified in one filesystem.
    Permissions
    Model to representate permissions of a File or a Folder.
    RemoteFile
    A RemoteFile represents a File located on a remote filesystem.
    RemoteFolder
    A RemoteFolder represents a Folder located on a remote filesystem.
    RemoteFSObject
    Represents a object of our file system tree which is located on a remote computer.
